00020         public Player(Point startPosition, Team team)
00021         {

00023

00027         public void DrawToField(Graphics field)
00028         {
00029             var brush = Team == Team.Current ? Brushes.Green : Brushes.Red;
00030 
00031             var startPoint = (PointF)Position - new SizeF(PlayerSize.Width / 2, PlayerSize.Height / 2);
00032             var rect = new RectangleF(startPoint, PlayerSize);
00033 
00034             field.FillRectangle(brush, rect);
00035             field.DrawRectangle(Pens.Yellow, Rectangle.Round(rect));
00036         }
00037 
00038         public Team Team { get; private set; }
00039 
00040

00042         {
00043             get { return PlayerSize; }
